summary: Diff implements a 4-page responsive marketing site with routing (Home/Services/About/Contact), header/footer branding, contact info with tel/mailto links, services listings with descriptions, and SEO/Open Graph metadata. Use of generated logo/hero images is referenced in UI, but the actual image asset files under frontend/public/assets/generated are not shown in the diff summary. Several additional infrastructure/auth/backend files were added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images to the project as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence of the required static assets cannot be verified from the provided diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer contains the same phone number and email address exactly as provided (Phone: 9053146001, Email: inkhiya14@gmail.com).
missing_requirements.reason: The footer file content is truncated mid-email (shows only a partial email string), so it cannot be confirmed from the diff summary that the footer displays the email exactly as provided.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty Motoko backend actor file.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is for a marketing website and does not request backend changes; adding backend/main.mo is not specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced React Query + Internet Identity provider wiring and actor hook behavior for authenticated/anonymous actors.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly notes Internet Identity is supported but not required for this website; no authentication-related functionality was requested for the marketing site.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extra (non-requested) Contact page content such as business hours, process steps, and additional CTAs.
hallucinated_features.reason: Only prominent phone/email display was requested for Contact; the additional sections are beyond the explicit requirements.
